page.description: Generates a qrcode image. Returns either binary PNG data or base64 encoded string with 'data:image/png;base64,' prefix
page.syntax: A blobOrString = qrcode_bitmap(C text [,C flag [,N width [,N height [,L flagBase64encodedWithPrefix ]]]])

argument.name: width
argument.description: Numeric. width of bitmap in pixels

argument.name: height
argument.description: Numeric. height of bitmap in pixels. If .t. then return a base64 encoded string with the 'data:image/png;base64,' prefix

argument.name: flagBase64encodedWithPrefix
argument.description: Logical. if .t. then return a base64 encoded string with the 'data:image/png;base64,' prefix

page.discussion: Generates a bitmap of a QR Code - This function is a wrapper for the ::QRCode::Creator::GeneratePng() function. However, it is able to scale the bitmap to an explicit size.
